snippet: The documentary “Indian Point,” directed by Ivy Meeropol, focuses on complaints about the safety of this power plant, about 45 miles from Midtown Manhattan....
abstract: Ken Jaworowski reviews Indian Point, Ivy Meeropol documentary about upstate New York nuclear power plant.
lead_paragraph: The documentary “Indian Point,” directed by Ivy Meeropol, focuses on complaints about the safety of this power plant, about 45 miles from Midtown Manhattan.

headline.main: Review: Is the Indian Point Nuclear Plant Safe? Nobody Knows
